author: Ted Byrne
content: It is sad that I did not get here first, before Michael. Sigh... Now I have to just say, "Me Too" about all of the wonderful techique you show in ths capture. It just cannot be improved upon and the mystery of the swirling stairs is enticingly enhanced by the shadows into which they dissapear. It makes me wonder whether there are sounds that support this setting? You know, things that go bump or whirrr off in the distance? And wonder is a precondition to art, right?
